import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import {Payment} from "./Payment"; export const ItemView = ({item, toggleBuy, onClickBuy, onClickPay }) => (
Previous Next

{item.name}

Some description of the item. Some description of the item some description to be added here some description of the item to be added here

Price ${item.price}

{(!toggleBuy)? : }
{ toggleBuy?

Payment Details

: "" }
); ItemView.propTypes = { item: PropTypes.shape({ name: PropTypes.string.isRequired, price: PropTypes.number.isRequired, images: PropTypes.array.isRequired }), onClickBuy: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onClickPay: PropTypes.func.isRequired };
